openAccount.text: You can open a new account online via our website or visit any branch with valid ID documents.

documents.text: To open a new account, please provide one valid government-issued ID and proof of address.

loan.text: We offer personal loans, home loans, and car loans. You can apply online or at any branch.

loanRequirements.text: Basic requirements include a valid ID, proof of income, and minimum age 21. For more details, contact our customer service.

creditCards.text: We provide various credit cards: Classic, Gold, and Platinum. Benefits vary depending on the card.

applyCard.text: You can apply for a credit card online or at any branch. Please check eligibility requirements before applying.

lostCard.text: If your card is lost or stolen, please block it immediately to prevent unauthorized transactions.

blockCard.text: You can block your card via our mobile app or by calling customer service at +1-800-123-4567.
